name: Venomous Snake
description: A tiny, slithering creature with a long, slender body, capable of swimming smoothly through water.
memorable: Its bite delivers both piercing damage and potent poison, making it a dangerous adversary despite its small size.
goals: Typically seeks to ambush prey or defend its territory.
relations: May be found in environments where other snakes or small predators reside.
environment: Commonly found in forests, swamps, or near bodies of water.
strengths: Fast and nimble, allowing it to evade predators and ambush prey effectively.
weaknesses: Low hit points and minimal defense make it vulnerable to direct attacks.
attacks: Bite attack that deals piercing and poison damage.
most_powerful_ability: Bite attack inflicts additional poison damage on a successful hit.
senses: Possesses blindsight up to 10 feet, allowing it to detect nearby creatures without relying on sight.
additional_information: Can swim as swiftly as it moves on land.
Typically hides among foliage or near water to ambush.
May act as a nuisance in areas inhabited by larger creatures.
